definition: to do a body search/to frisk
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: The search was then finished on all the other attenders, however, the coin failed to appear again.
sentences.chinese: 很快其他人都通過了搜身，然而金幣還是沒有出現。

sentences.english: Police officers frisked men during a night patrol.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲治安警察在夜間巡邏時對兩名男性進行搜身。

sentences.english: The passengers were frisked before they were allowed to board the plane.
sentences.chinese: 乘客們在被允許登上飛機前先被搜身。

sentences.english: sex, sex positions, relationships. men, dating a women in puppet strings Stand facing a wall, as if you’re about to be strip-searched, placing both hands slightly above your head.
sentences.chinese: 面牆而站立，就像是要脫衣搜身，雙手稍稍靠在頭上。

sentences.english: Are they going to frisk all the passengers?
sentences.chinese: 他們要對所有乘客搜身嗎？

sentences.english: All of the passengers were frisked by the airport police.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都由機場的警察進行搜身。

sentences.english: Fans can expect airport type security with mandatory pat-downs.
sentences.chinese: 球迷將被強制搜身，接受機場一樣的安全檢查。

sentences.english: The policeman frisked him for hidden weapons.
sentences.chinese: 警察向他搜身，以確定有無隱藏武器。

sentences.english: Ten suspects were being frisked at the station.
sentences.chinese: 當時10名嫌疑犯正在車站被搜身。

sentences.english: They gave him a thorough frisk for drugs.
sentences.chinese: 他們對他徹底搜身尋找毒品。
只是他們的父母被搜身了。

sentences.english: But finally, they were caught to the refugee camp, where they were searched one by one.
sentences.chinese: 最終，他們還是被抓進了難民營，被一個個搜身。

sentences.english: I gotta get better at frisking.
sentences.chinese: 回頭要好好提高搜身術咯。

sentences.english: Stand facing a wall, as if you’re about to be strip-searched, placing both hands slightly above your head.
sentences.chinese: 面牆而站立，就像是要脫衣搜身，雙手稍稍靠在頭上。

definition: to beat a prisoner (to obtain confessions)/to give sb the third degree/to torture
to detain/to take into custody/to imprison temporarily
